document.full_text: russia said on monday it had set a new date for the launch of three u.s. and russian astronauts to the international space station (iss), almost one week after problems with its soyuz craft forced it to cancel an earlier launch.
document.title: russia sets new soyuz launch date on april 5
lines_and_colors: russia said on monday it had set a new date for the launch of three u.s. and russian astronauts to the international space station (iss), almost one week after problems with its soyuz craft forced it to cancel an earlier launch.
